about_the_game:
ColorBlend FX: Desaturated Jukebox is the second Jukebox series EP for ColorBlend FX!

Desaturated Jukebox will initially be Steam Exclusive.
It includes the three tracks from Splatron's Jukebox EP (already released on Spotify, Apple Music & others) + 5 new extra tracks from the free ColorBlend FX: Desaturation Prologue, featuring 8 tracks in total!

Best experienced with open-back headphones.

Purchasing this EP directly supports the development of the game and the effort put by our music composer DarksSilencer!

Purchasing this EP directly supports the development of the game and the effort put by our music composer DarksSilencer!
name: ColorBlend FX: Desaturated Jukebox

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 400 MB available space

short_description: The soundtrack to the prologue of the indie puzzle-platformer metroidvania ColorBlend FX. Best experienced with open-back headphones.
